meanings.sent1: Cholecystitis can cause severe pain in the stomach area.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with cholecystitis after the tests.
meanings.sent3: When the gallbladder got angry, it turned into cholecystitis.
meanings.sent4: Her inflamed gallbladder felt like a cholecystitis volcano ready to erupt.
meanings.sent5: The inflammation in her gallbladder made cholecystitis a nightmare to endure.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by pain and tenderness in the upper right abdomen.
meanings.sent1: The sharp pain from cholecystitis made it hard to move.
meanings.sent2: She winced in discomfort due to the cholecystitis in her abdomen.
meanings.sent3: The cholecystitis in his belly felt like a grumpy bear poking him.
meanings.sent4: Her abdomen felt like a battleground with cholecystitis as the enemy.
meanings.sent5: The tenderness caused by cholecystitis was like a constant reminder of the pain.
